21  void DST::operator()(SeqViewDouble& in, SeqViewDouble& out) {
22  // Get data
23  Dmatrix* data_in = in.GetData();
24  Dmatrix* data_out = out.GetData();
25 
26  // Check dimensions
27  if ((data_in->size1() != data_out->size1()) || (data_in->size2() != data_out->size2())) {
28  data_out->resize(data_in->size1(), data_in->size2());
29  LogWarning("DST: resizing output array");
30  }
31 
32  execute(*data_in, *data_out);
33 
34 
35  // Adjust attributes
36  out.SetStart(0.0);
37  out.SetSampling(1.0 / in.GetSlice());
38  out.SetScale(in.GetScale() * in.GetSampling() / in.GetSize());
39 
40  }
41 
42  void DST::execute(Dmatrix& indata, Dmatrix& outdata) throw (bad_matrix_size) {
43 
44  if ((indata.size1() != outdata.size1()) || (indata.size2() != outdata.size2())) {
45  LogSevere("DST::execute - bad matrix size");
46  throw bad_matrix_size("DST::execute");
47  }
48 
49  if (indata.size2() != mLogicalSize) {
50  mPlanNeedsUpdate = true;
51  }
52 
53  if (mPlanNeedsUpdate) {
54  mLogicalSize = indata.size2();
55  MakePlan();
56  }
57 
58  size_t isize1 = indata.size1();
59 
60  for (size_t i = 0; i < isize1; i++) {
61 
62  fftw_execute_r2r(
63  mPlan,
64  (double*) &indata(i, 0),
65  (double*) &outdata(i, 0)
66  );
67  }
68 
69  }
70 
71  void DST::execute(Dvector& indata, Dvector& outdata) throw (bad_vector_size) {
72 
73  if (indata.size() != outdata.size()) {
74  LogSevere("DST::execute - bad vector size");
75  throw bad_vector_size("DST::execute");
76  }
77 
78  if (indata.size() != mLogicalSize) {
79  mPlanNeedsUpdate = true;
80  }
81 
82  if (mPlanNeedsUpdate) {
83  mLogicalSize = indata.size();
84  MakePlan();
85  }
86 
87  fftw_execute_r2r(
88  mPlan,
89  (double*) &indata(0),
90  (double*) &outdata(0)
91  );
92 
93  }
94 
95  void DST::MakePlan() throw (std::runtime_error) {
96  LogInfo("DST::MakePlan start");
97  if (mPlan) {
98  fftw_destroy_plan(mPlan);
99  }
100  double *in = (double*) fftw_malloc(sizeof (double)*mLogicalSize);
101  double *out = (double*) fftw_malloc(sizeof (double)*((mLogicalSize / 2) + 1));
102  mPlan = fftw_plan_r2r_1d(mLogicalSize, in, out, FFTW_RODFT00, FFTW_UNALIGNED | mPlanningRigor | mPlanningRestriction);
103  if (mPlan == NULL) {
104  LogSevere("DST::MakePlan - error");
105  throw std::runtime_error("DST::MakePlan");
106  }
107  fftw_free(in);
108  fftw_free(out);
109  mPlanNeedsUpdate = false;
110  LogInfo("DST::MakePlan end");
111  }
